#chef

``

chef-server-ctl reconfigure chef-server-ctl user-create heidsoft heid soft heidsoft@qq.com ‘123456’ –filename /opt/stevedanno.pem chef-server-ctl org-create heidsoft ‘heidsoft.com’ –association_user heidsoft –filename /opt/heidsoft-validator.pem chef-server-ctl install chef-manage chef-server-ctl reconfigure chef-manage-ctl reconfigure

``
